material.mattext: Numerical data includes all integer numbers and all real numbers.
Character data includes all numerical data.
True (T, y, or yes) and False (F, n, or no) are the only values in the logical data set.
An equation and an expression are the same thing.
A function is a set of instructions to input data into the computer.
The hierarchy of operations identifies the order in which the operators are executed.
The NOT operator reverses the operand.
The = sign is an operator as well as part of an assignment statement.
A parameter is the data required to process an assignment statement.
Real numbers and integer numbers are not included in numerical data
Character data does not include all numerical data.
True and False are not the only values in the logical data set.
An expression is the same as an equation
A set of instructions to input data into a computer is known as a function.
The order in which operators are executed identifies the hierarchy of operations
A variable can be changed while a solution is being executed
A variable is stored in a named memory location
A variable is given a specific data type
String data is not a group of characters
The data type of a parameter may be a constant
The data type of a parameter may be an expression or a variable
The resultant of A OR B is always false except when A and B are both false
The resultant of the A OR B is always true except when A and B are both false
The data type of the resultant is relational if the operands are both numerical and the operator is relational
If the operands are both numerical and the operator is relational, the data type of the resultant is Logical
The data type of Zip Codes must always be numeric data
The data type of Zip Codes can be either numeric or string data
Is stored in a named memory location.
Can be changed while a solution is being executed.
Is given a specific data type.
Can be used to calculate expressions.
Does not use quotes around the characters.
In the following expression, what is the order of execution of the operators and the result, given A = 4, B = 5, E = 3, G = True, F = True? A * B + 7 > E ^ 3 OR NOT G AND F
^, *, +, >, NOT, AND, OR : Result is True
^, *, +, >, NOT, AND, OR : Result is False
Evaluate the following equation for R, given A = 4, B = 5, C = 8 is: R = A + B * 2 (C + 4) / A
In the equation: R = A + B * 2 (C + 4) / A, the operands are:
An ideal variable name for a client name is:
The data type of a parameter may be:
In the function LEFT(S,3), the parameter(s):
The resultant of A OR B
Is always true except when A and B are both false.
Is always false except when A and B are both false.
If the operands are both numerical, and the operator is relational, the data type of the resultant is:
In the following equation under what conditions would PriorityUse be True? PriorityUse = (ValidCard AND TimeNoted) OR (Computer AND GuestCard)
ValidCard is True, TimeNoted is True, Computer is True, GuestCard is False.
ValidCard is False, TimeNoted is True, Computer is False, GuestCard is True.
ValidCard is True, TimeNoted is False, Computer is True, GuestCard is False.
Can be either numeric or string data.
